meanings.def: causing damage or injury to somebody/something, especially to a person’s health or to the environment
examples: Many household products are potentially harmful.
harmful to somebody/something Exercising in polluted air is harmful to your health.
Fruit juices can be harmful to children's teeth.
Keep food chilled to prevent the spread of harmful bacteria.
Not all virus infections are necessarily harmful.
The spraying could prove harmful to humans.
The extensive use of fertilizers is harmful to the environment.
